raw_text:
# Planning Division - Active Projects

Here you can find information on Development Planning Projects within the City of El Segundo. To sign up for updates related to zoning, projects, CEQA, Planning Commission, and other planning topics please click [here](https://public.govdelivery.com/accounts/CAELSEGUNDO/subscriber/new).

## Available Resources

- [Approved Projects](https://www.elsegundo.org/government/departments/community-development/planning-division/approved-projects/approved-projects/-fsiteid-1#!/)
- [Pending Projects](https://www.elsegundo.org/government/departments/community-development/planning-division/approved-projects/pending-projects/-fsiteid-1#!/)

For all general inquiries and related matters, please visit our [EZ Permit Hub](https://elsegundoca.portal.opengov.com/categories/1078) to submit any inquiries to Planning Division.

structured_data.overview: Information page about the Planning Division's active projects in the City of El Segundo, including resources for approved and pending projects, and how to sign up for updates on planning topics.

forms.name: Planning Updates Signup
forms.purpose: To receive updates related to zoning, projects, CEQA, Planning Commission, and other planning topics

signup_info.description: Sign up for updates related to zoning, projects, CEQA, Planning Commission, and other planning topics

structured_data.other_info: The Planning Division provides resources for viewing approved projects and pending projects within the city. Citizens can submit inquiries to the Planning Division through the EZ Permit Hub portal.
